answers.answer: HI,With a previous caesarean delivery and diabetes yours is a high risk pregnancy. Waiting till term has associated risks to the baby because of diabetes and to the mother due to prior section. It is difficult to comment without an examination and assessment of the situation. Hence it would be best to follow the advice of your treating Doctor. Hope this helps.Take care and good luck.

question: I am 37 week pregnanat, i am daibetic taking insulin and my sugar is in almost control my dabetic dr. Is satisfied with the sugar level and had permitted me to wait for 40 weeks but my gyne is not satisfied with the dr. And insisiting me for the cesarion i have already a baby boy with c- section, what should i do my report are normal and ultrasound too, is rhis safe to wait for normal when i have already scares
title: gestatinal pregnancy and c-section
